title: Tales of anguish emerge from China's locked-down Xi'an as hospitals demand patients are covid-free
content:
1. Tales of anguish emerge from China's locked-down Xi'an as hospitals demand patients are covid-free  The Washington Post
  2. Desperation as China’s locked down cities pay price of zero-Covid strategy  The Guardian
  3. Xi'an reacts to COVID lockdowns with outrage and humor  NPR
contentSnippet:
Tales of anguish emerge from China's locked-down Xi'an as hospitals demand patients are covid-free  The Washington Post
Desperation as China’s locked down cities pay price of zero-Covid strategy  The Guardian
Xi'an reacts to COVID lockdowns with outrage and humor  NPR

localize.title: 中国被封锁的西安出现了痛苦的故事，因为医院要求病人不携带病毒
中國被封鎖的西安出現了痛苦的故事，因爲醫院要求病人不攜帶病毒
中国・西安の病院が患者のコビドフリーを要求し、封鎖された西安から苦悩の物語が浮かび上がる
